text:
Netflix Announces July 2017 Movie and TV Titles: Say Hello to Titanic and Goodbye to How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days

How many movies and TV shows can you binge-watch in nine days? On Wednesday, Netflix announced the next wave of titles coming and going in July. Subscribers are sure to be thrilled with…

http://ift.tt/2sqz1Tz
